text: Travelling Light is a 1959 British naturist documentary from Edward Craven Walker.Simon Sheridan, Keeping the British End Up: Four Decades of Saucy Cinema, Titan Books 2011 pp. 38-39 He made it to show it to clubs and people in the hope of persuading them to join ‘Naturist way of life’ he loved. It premiered in London's West End ==References== ==External links== *Travelling Light at Docmasters *Extract of film at YouTube Category:British films Category:British documentary films
title: Travelling Light (1959 film)
